testcase.name: User Should Login With Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out:
Feature: Login Functionality
@validLogin Scenario: User Should Login With Valid Credentials # src/test/resources/functionalTests/End2End_Test.feature:3 Given Post Login API # Steps.post_login_api() When Provide Valid Credential # Steps.provide_valid_credential() Then Status_code equals 200 # Steps.statuscode_equals_(int)

testcase.name: Create a new user
testcase.error: java.lang.NullPointerException at stepDefinitions.Steps.i_send_a_post_request_email_id_passowrd_username(Steps.java:99) at ✽.I send a POST request email, id, password, Username(file:src/test/resources/functionalTests/End2End_Test.feature:9)
testcase.system-out:
Scenario: Create a new user # src/test/resources/functionalTests/End2End_Test.feature:7 Given I have a valid data for user creation # Steps.i_have_a_valid_data_for_user_creation() When I send a POST request email, id, password, Username # Steps.i_send_a_post_request_email_id_passowrd_username() java.lang.NullPointerException at stepDefinitions.Steps.i_send_a_post_request_email_id_passowrd_username(Steps.java:99) at ?.I send a POST request email, id, password, Username(file:src/test/resources/functionalTests/End2End_Test.feature:9)
Then the response status code should be 200 for created user # Steps.the_response_status_code_should_be_(int) And the response should contain the username # Steps.the_response_should_contain_the_username() And the response should contain the email # Steps.the_response_should_contain_the_email()
